signature.instructions: You are a highly skilled AI working for a fact-checking organization. Your critical mission is to prevent the spread of misinformation and harmful content by accurately classifying news headlines. Classify the news headline as sarcastic/fake (1) or not (0). Your classification must be precise, as mislabeling could have severe societal consequences.

fields.description: A score between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating certainty
1 if the title is sarcastic, 0 if not.
